text:
<@U504BHZ6K>, <@UG52C29EE>

Did you guys manage to solve this issue. Few months ago I was dealing with the same issue and according to HubSpot's Support (at the time) it wasn't possible. Supposedly, the answer I've gotten had been consulted first internally with some HubSpot's geeks.

<@UPSCA4MMX> sure you can. You can even create dedicated pages for those events.

I did something similar combining *dynamic pages* with HubDB table that was being feed with data by 3rd scripts.
Passing `[{"id":1,"type":"option"},{"id":4,"type":"option"}]` in the input worked for Russel.
Cool, good to know, will try it out.
